func:
var inv_cap=flow.get("INV_CAPACITY");
var array=[]
 var Total_exp_WR1=0
 var Total_exp_WR2=0
var Total_exp_wechselrichter=0
var Total_exp_WR_delta_M15A_220=0
var Total_exp_ABB_WR1=0
var Total_exp_Delta=0
 
var Total_ACT_WR1 = 0
var Total_ACT_WR2 = 0
var Total_ACT_wechselrichter = 0
var Total_ACT_WR_delta_M15A_220 = 0
var Total_ACT_ABB_WR1 = 0
var Total_ACT_Delta = 0

var Total_gen_loss_WR1=0
var Total_gen_loss_WR2 = 0
var Total_gen_loss_wechselrichter = 0
var Total_gen_loss_WR_delta_M15A_220 = 0
var Total_gen_loss_ABB_WR1 = 0
var Total_gen_loss_Delta = 0

var obj
for (var i = 0; i < msg.payload.length; i++)
{  if(i<msg.payload.length){
    var DATE = msg.payload[i].date
    var WR_1_kwh = (msg.payload[i]["WR 1"])/1000 
    var WR_1_Sp_Y = msg.payload[i]["Specific Yield_WR 1"]
    var WR_2_kwh = (msg.payload[i]["WR 2"])/1000 
    var WR_2_Sp_Y = msg.payload[i]["Specific Yield_WR 2"]
    var wechselrichter_kwh = (msg.payload[i].Wechselrichter)/1000
    var WR_delta_M15A_220_kwh = (msg.payload[i]["WR Delta M15A_220"]) / 1000
    var ABB_WR1_kwh = (msg.payload[i]["ABB WR 1"])/1000
    var Delta_kwh = (msg.payload[i].Delta)/1000
    var wechselrichter_Sp_Y = msg.payload[i]["Specific Yield_Wechselrichter"]
    var WR_delta_M15A_220_Sp_Y = msg.payload[i]["Specific Yield_WR Delta M15A_220"]
    var ABB_WR1_Sp_Y = msg.payload[i]["Specific Yield_ABB WR 1"]
    var Delta_Sp_Y = msg.payload[i]["Specific Yield_Delta"]
   

    var Max_sy = Math.max(WR_1_Sp_Y || 0, WR_2_Sp_Y || 0, wechselrichter_Sp_Y || 0, WR_delta_M15A_220_Sp_Y || 0, ABB_WR1_Sp_Y || 0, Delta_Sp_Y || 0)

    var WR1_INV_CAPACITY=inv_cap[0]
    var WR2_INV_CAPACITY = inv_cap[1]
    var wechselrichter_CAPACITY = inv_cap[2]
    var WR_delta_M15A_220_CAPACITY = inv_cap[3]
    var ABB_WR1_CAPACITY = inv_cap[4]
    var Delta_CAPACITY = inv_cap[5]

    var Expected_gen_WR1 = Max_sy * WR1_INV_CAPACITY
    var Expected_gen_WR2 =Max_sy * WR2_INV_CAPACITY
    var Expected_gen_wechselrichter =Max_sy* wechselrichter_CAPACITY
    var Expected_gen_WR_delta_M15A_220 =Max_sy* WR_delta_M15A_220_CAPACITY
    var Expected_gen_ABB_WR1 =Max_sy* ABB_WR1_CAPACITY
    var Expected_gen_Delta =Max_sy* Delta_CAPACITY

    Total_exp_WR1 = Total_exp_WR1 + Expected_gen_WR1
    Total_exp_WR2 = Total_exp_WR2 + Expected_gen_WR2
    Total_exp_wechselrichter= Total_exp_wechselrichter +Expected_gen_wechselrichter
    Total_exp_WR_delta_M15A_220= Total_exp_WR_delta_M15A_220 +Expected_gen_WR_delta_M15A_220
    Total_exp_ABB_WR1= Total_exp_ABB_WR1 +Expected_gen_ABB_WR1
    Total_exp_Delta= Total_exp_Delta +Expected_gen_Delta

    Total_ACT_WR1 = Total_ACT_WR1 + WR_1_kwh
    Total_ACT_WR2 = Total_ACT_WR2 + WR_2_kwh
    Total_ACT_wechselrichter=Total_ACT_wechselrichter+wechselrichter_kwh
    Total_ACT_WR_delta_M15A_220=Total_ACT_WR_delta_M15A_220+WR_delta_M15A_220_kwh
    Total_ACT_ABB_WR1=Total_ACT_ABB_WR1+ABB_WR1_kwh
    Total_ACT_Delta=Total_ACT_Delta+Delta_kwh
    
    if ((Expected_gen_WR1 != WR_1_kwh ) || (WR_1_kwh==0)){ var GEN_LOSS_WR1 = (Expected_gen_WR1 - WR_1_kwh) } else { GEN_LOSS_WR1 = "0"}
    if ((Expected_gen_WR2 != WR_2_kwh) || (WR_2_kwh == 0)) { var GEN_LOSS_WR2 = (Expected_gen_WR2 - WR_2_kwh) } else { GEN_LOSS_WR2 = "0" }
    if ((Expected_gen_wechselrichter !=wechselrichter_kwh ) || (wechselrichter_kwh)) {var GEN_LOSS_wechselrichter=(Expected_gen_wechselrichter -wechselrichter_kwh)} else {GEN_LOSS_wechselrichter ="0"}
    if ((Expected_gen_WR_delta_M15A_220 !=WR_delta_M15A_220_kwh ) || (WR_delta_M15A_220_kwh)) {var GEN_LOSS_WR_delta_M15A_220=(Expected_gen_WR_delta_M15A_220 -WR_delta_M15A_220_kwh)} else {GEN_LOSS_WR_delta_M15A_220 ="0"}
    if ((Expected_gen_ABB_WR1 !=ABB_WR1_kwh ) || (ABB_WR1_kwh)) {var GEN_LOSS_ABB_WR1=(Expected_gen_ABB_WR1 -ABB_WR1_kwh)} else {GEN_LOSS_ABB_WR1 ="0"}
    if ((Expected_gen_Delta !=Delta_kwh ) || (Delta_kwh)) {var GEN_LOSS_Delta=(Expected_gen_Delta -Delta_kwh)} else {GEN_LOSS_Delta ="0"}


    Total_gen_loss_WR1 = Total_gen_loss_WR1 + (Expected_gen_WR1 - WR_1_kwh)
    Total_gen_loss_WR2 = Total_gen_loss_WR2 + (Expected_gen_WR2 - WR_2_kwh)
    Total_gen_loss_wechselrichter = Total_gen_loss_wechselrichter + (Expected_gen_wechselrichter -wechselrichter_kwh  )
    Total_gen_loss_WR_delta_M15A_220 = Total_gen_loss_WR_delta_M15A_220 + (Expected_gen_WR_delta_M15A_220 -WR_delta_M15A_220_kwh  )
    Total_gen_loss_ABB_WR1 = Total_gen_loss_ABB_WR1 + (Expected_gen_ABB_WR1 -ABB_WR1_kwh  )
    Total_gen_loss_Delta = Total_gen_loss_Delta + (Expected_gen_Delta -Delta_kwh  )


    var total_act_gen = [{
        Total_ACT_WR1, Total_ACT_WR2, Total_ACT_wechselrichter,Total_ACT_WR_delta_M15A_220,Total_ACT_ABB_WR1,Total_ACT_Delta}]
    var total_exp_gen = [Total_exp_WR1, Total_exp_WR2, Total_exp_wechselrichter,Total_exp_WR_delta_M15A_220,Total_exp_ABB_WR1,Total_exp_Delta]
    var totalgen_loss = [Total_gen_loss_WR1, Total_gen_loss_WR2,Total_gen_loss_wechselrichter,Total_gen_loss_WR_delta_M15A_220,Total_gen_loss_ABB_WR1,Total_gen_loss_Delta]


    obj = {
        DATE,
         WR_1_kwh,
         WR_1_Sp_Y,
         WR_2_kwh,
        WR_2_Sp_Y,
        wechselrichter_kwh,
        wechselrichter_Sp_Y,
WR_delta_M15A_220_kwh,
WR_delta_M15A_220_Sp_Y,
ABB_WR1_kwh,
ABB_WR1_Sp_Y,
Delta_kwh,
Delta_Sp_Y,
         Max_sy,
        Expected_gen_WR1:Expected_gen_WR1.toFixed(2),
        Expected_gen_WR2:Expected_gen_WR2.toFixed(2),
        Expected_gen_wechselrichter:Expected_gen_wechselrichter.toFixed(2),
        Expected_gen_WR_delta_M15A_220:Expected_gen_WR_delta_M15A_220.toFixed(2),
        Expected_gen_ABB_WR1:Expected_gen_ABB_WR1.toFixed(2),
        Expected_gen_Delta:Expected_gen_Delta.toFixed(2),

        
        GEN_LOSS_WR1:parseFloat(GEN_LOSS_WR1).toFixed(2),
        GEN_LOSS_WR2:parseFloat(GEN_LOSS_WR2).toFixed(2),
        GEN_LOSS_wechselrichter:parseFloat(GEN_LOSS_wechselrichter).toFixed(2),
        GEN_LOSS_WR_delta_M15A_220:parseFloat(GEN_LOSS_WR_delta_M15A_220).toFixed(2),
        GEN_LOSS_ABB_WR1:parseFloat(GEN_LOSS_ABB_WR1).toFixed(2),
        GEN_LOSS_Delta:parseFloat(GEN_LOSS_Delta).toFixed(2),
        
    }
}
   /* if (i == msg.payload.length) {
        obj = {
            DATE: "null" + '\n' +"TOTAL","WR 1 (kWh)": "null" + '\n' + Total_ACT_WR1, "Specific Yield (kWh / kWp)": "null" + '\n' + "null", "WR 2 (kWh)": "null" + '\n' + Total_ACT_WR2, "Specific Yield2 (kWh / kWp)": "null" + '\n' + "null", "Total Yield Wh": "null" + '\n' + "null", "average specific yield (kWh / kWp)": "null" + '\n' + "null", "Max_sy": "null", "Expected_gen_WR1": "null" + '\n' + Total_exp_WR1.toFixed(2), "Expected_gen_WR2": "null" + '\n' + Total_exp_WR2.toFixed(2), "GEN_LOSS_WR1": "null" + '\n' + Total_gen_loss_WR1.toFixed(2), "GEN_LOSS_WR2": "null" + '\n' + Total_gen_loss_WR2.toFixed(2)
        }
    }*/

    array.push(obj)
    
}
flow.set("out", array);
flow.set("totalgen_loss",totalgen_loss)
flow.set("total_act_gen",total_act_gen)
flow.set("total_exp_gen", total_exp_gen)

msg.payload=array
return msg;
